gov.usgs.locator

Class Hypocenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.locator.Hypocenter

  • public class Hypocenter
extends java.lang.Object
    Keep all the data for one hypocenter together.
    Author:
    Ray Buland

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Hypocenter(double originTime, double latitude, double longitude, double depth)
      Initializes a hypocenter with enough information to start a location pass.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Hypocenter

        public Hypocenter(double originTime,
                  double latitude,
                  double longitude,
                  double depth)
        Initializes a hypocenter with enough information to start a location pass.
        Parameters:
        originTime - Origin time in seconds
        latitude - Geographic latitude in degrees
        longitude - Longitude in degrees
        depth - Depth in kilometers

    • Method Detail

      • getOrigin

        public double getOrigin()

      • getLatitude

        public double getLatitude()

      • getLongitude

        public double getLongitude()

      • getDepth

        public double getDepth()

      • addBayes

        public void addBayes(double bayesDepth,
                     double bayesSpread)
        Set an analyst requested Bayesian depth. Note that this forces the event starting depth to the Bayesian depth.
        Parameters:
        bayesDepth - Bayesian depth in kilometers
        bayesSpread - Uncertainty of the Bayesian depth in kilometers

      • setDegrees

        public void setDegrees(boolean heldLoc,
                       boolean heldDepth)
        Set the number of event degrees of freedom to be determined.
        Parameters:
        heldLoc - True if the hypocenter will be held constant
        heldDepth - True if the depth will be held constant

      • updateHypo

        public void updateHypo(double originTime,
                       double latitude,
                       double longitude,
                       double depth)
        Update the hypocentral parameters and recompute the sines and cosines.
        Parameters:
        originTime - Event origin time in seconds since the epoch
        latitude - Geographic latitude in degrees
        longitude - Longitude in degrees
        depth - Depth in kilometers

      • updateHypo

        public void updateHypo(double stepLen,
                       double dT)
        Move the hypocenter based on the linearized optimal step.
        Parameters:
        stepLen - Step length in kilometers
        dT - Origin time shift in seconds

      • updateOrigin

        public void updateOrigin(double dT)
        Update the origin time.
        Parameters:
        dT - Shift in the origin time in seconds

      • updateBayes

        public void updateBayes(double bayesDepth,
                        double bayesSpread)
        Update the Bayesian depth (if not set by an analyst).
        Parameters:
        bayesDepth - Bayesian depth in kilometers
        bayesSpread - Uncertainty of the Bayesian depth in kilometers

      • resetHypo

        public void resetHypo(HypoAudit backup)
        Reset key hypocentral parameters to a backup (used for step length damping).
        Parameters:
        backup - Hypocenter audit record

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        A convenient way of dumping the current hypocenter.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
